title: Cartoon Villains
author: VD
content_html:
Now the globalists at the World Evil Forum are coming for your coffee:

Swiss banker and World Economic Forum “agenda contributor”, Hubert Keller: “The coffee that we all drink emits between 15 and 20 tonnes of CO2 per tonne of coffee… Every time we drink coffee, we are basically putting CO2 into the atmosphere.”

This is an example of how we know anthropogenic global warming is faker than fake. There is literally nothing they claim doesn’t somehow cause it. And every single possible solution, or even amelioration, involves obeying their retarded dictates.

DISCUSS ON SG
